detailProject.title: Restaurant Ordering System
detailProject.description: A modern restaurant ordering platform that supports online ordering, order management, and efficient kitchen operations.
detailProject.fullDescription: A comprehensive restaurant ordering system built with Next.js for the user interface and Supabase for backend services and data management. The system supports online ordering via web and QR codes, category-based menu management, shopping cart functionality, real-time order processing, user authentication, and an admin dashboard for staff and managers. This platform helps streamline restaurant operations, reduce ordering errors, and enhance the overall customer experience.
